-1.title: Mama Drama
-1.plot: Moe and Lizzy rescue a sick, scared stray, but a diagnosis proves tricky. A friend of the rescue visits in hope of adopting a dog that has previously been overlooked. And new mom Tania struggles to find a balance between life and work at Villalobos.

1.title: Second Chance Ranch
1.plot: Tia Torres works to rescue and rehabilitate pit bulls at Villalobos Rescue Center with the help of her family and a team of parolees.

2.title: Redemption
2.plot: Tia Torres and her team of parolees work with a cast of Renaissance fair pirates who are looking to adopt a pit bull. Meanwhile, Tia's husband goes to court to face a bail hearing.

3.title: Whiteout
3.plot: While Tia is traveling with her daughter to rescue a pit in Sacramento and a stray outside Wasco state prison, the parolees deal with a sudden snowstorm back at the ranch.

4.title: Crisis
4.plot: Tia deals with a series of crises as Tania, her older daughter refuses to pull her weight. And what goes missing? A parolee.

5.title: On the Run
5.plot: Tia tries to track down a wild pit bull that has been living in a park.

6.title: Sin City
6.plot: Running a rescue shelter is a financial strain, and it's getting harder for Tia to make ends meet. Tia cannot turn down the offer of a benefit for Villalobos at a casino in Las Vegas.

2.title: Return to the Ranch
2.plot: A Rescue call about 2 puppies in a trucking warehouse. Jake gets an early release.

4.title: A Fighting Chance

5.title: Devastation
5.plot: Tia travels with her son to New Orleans, where a dog rescued during Hurricane Katrina is slated to be adopted. While there, Tia saves a stray during a lightning storm.

6.title: Beware of Dog

8.title: Mission of Mercy
8.plot: Earl takes the lead in restoring an abandoned Rottweiler to health. A service dog organization from North Carolina reaches out to Villalobos searching for a new dog for their program. M2 goes on her second rescue, taking in an owner surrender.

1.title: Judgement Day
1.plot: Tia's dream of relocating becomes a nightmare as fate turns against her. And, a call from the former owner of one of Villalobos most aggressive dogs leads to the ranch's most emotional reunion yet.

2.title: Prison Break
2.plot: Tia sends Jake and Armando on a rescue mission to Texas, after hearing about two pit bulls who were wounded in a run-in with a porcupine. Then, when a second story about a dog in death row comies in, the guys need to kick it into high gear.

3.title: New Blood
3.plot: Tia decides to hire new parolees, but one parolee may blow his chance at redemption before the first day is done. And then, one of Villalobos most beloved dogs, Creature, is on the receiving end of shocking news which may end his chances of being adopted.

4.title: Trapped
4.plot: It's a time of celebration as Armando's wedding day approaches, but even on this happy occasion the dogs come first. When a rescue mission becomes more than she bargained for, Tia is the one racing to the altar, not wanting to miss Armando's big day.

5.title: Southern Uprising
5.plot: Tia and the twins hit the road after she receives back to back calls for help from the South. After helping an army veteran with a new litter of puppies, the team find themselves on a wild chase after an injured dog through the streets of Jackson, MS.

6.title: Heart Broken
6.plot: Tia's daughter faces a difficult decision when her beloved dog's health takes a turn for the worse. Then, Tia sends her team to rescue a mother pit bull and her puppies from horrific conditions in an abandoned home.

7.title: Burn Out
7.plot: Parolee Cameron's demons rear their ugly heads again, and it's up to Tia to make a difficult decision and curb his downward spiral. Then, a family seeks temporary shelter for their pit bull at Villalobos, after losing their home in a fire.

8.title: Pushing the Limits
8.plot: Three roommates contact Tia about adopting a pit bull who can fit in with their extreme, fast-paced lifestyles. And, the parolees are sent running for cover when they uncover three beehives.

9.title: Cut Loose
9.plot: Tia, Mariah, the twins and the parolees launch a massive rescue effort to track down a pit bull and her puppies that have been dumped in the Mojave Desert.

10.title: Path of Destruction
10.plot: After a tornado rips through the heart of Alabama, Tia and Tania head south to help a devastated dog-rescue pick up the pieces. Meanwhile, back at Villalobos, Mariah oversees her first solo puppy adoption when a young couple visit the ranch.

12.title: End of the Road
12.plot: While in Georgia, Tia comes face to face with one of the most shocking rescues of her career. And a surprise animal control inspection leaves the future of Villalobos hanging in the balace.

1.title: New Orleans, Here We Come
1.plot: It's a whole new world for Tia, her family, the parolees, and most importantly, her pitbulls, when they pack up their lives and move across country to New Orleans. But the move is only the first of many challenges Tia faces.

2.title: Face Off
2.plot: Tia meets a family of eight looking to adopt a new dog after losing theirs to cancer. Then, a rescue-call takes Tia and her daughter Tania into New Orlean's infamous ninth ward to face off with a snarling, sick dog.

3.title: Ghost Dog
3.plot: After evading Tia for weeks, an elusive pit bull is saved from drowning in a canal by a young girl, and now she needs Tia's help. Then, with the arrival of 20 new puppies, Villalobos' pit bull population explodes, and Tia needs to hire another parolee.

4.title: A Gift from Heaven
4.plot: A request for help turns tragic when Tia and her daughter Mariah reach out to help a man care for two dogs he rescued. Then, a voluteer at Villalobos steps up to adopt a dog with an unusual past.

5.title: Saving Prada
5.plot: Tia, Tania and newest parolee Randy race to Nashville to rescue a dog from death row. With Tia away, Mariah battles a storm that threatens to flood Villalobos. Finally, one of the puppies rescued from the ninth ward has a chance at finding a forever home.

6.title: Swamped
6.plot: A dog abandoned in the swamps outside New Orleans propels Tia and the twins on a rescue mission by boat. Then, the stress of balancing work and parenthood threatens to send a young parolee over the edge.

7.title: Trapped Below
7.plot: A frantic call sends Tia and her crew on of their most dangerous rescues yet. At stake are the lives of a mama dog and her puppies. Then, when on of Tia's most loyal parolees reaches a crossroads in his life, Tia is left reeling.

8.title: Boiling Point
8.plot: As temperatures soar in New Orleans, so do tempers. Tia calls out the parolees on their laziness, leading to an explosive confrontation with new parolee Randy. Then, an unusual-looking dog rescued in the searing heat gets a chance at a forever home.

10.title: Buried Alive
10.plot: Tia is contacted by NBA star Zach Randolph regarding a dog rescued from a drainpipe in Memphis, after being trapped there for several days. And Mariah and Earl prepare a puppy rescued from the 9th Ward for adoption.

11.title: Freedom Fighters
11.plot: After Tia receives an anoymous tip, she and her team find themselves in a dangerous situation as they attempt to rescue dogs that may be involved in a dog-fighting ring. And, for one lucky pit bull, a new home awaits - if the resident dog agrees.

12.title: Making Miracles
12.plot: A dangerously ill dog is rescued by Tania and Tia from the streets of New Orleans. Villalobos favorite, Chong, takes a turn for the worse as his cancerous tumor grows. And Tia offers to help with a long distance adoption in New York City.

14.title: Storm on the Horizon
14.plot: With hurricane season approaching, Tia prepares for the worst. Then, Tia uncovers a clue that may help Mariah and the twins track down a Katrina dog's owner. And Villalobos employee Rico steps up to the plate when his grandparents adopt a shy dog.

15.title: Storm Surge
15.plot: Tia looks back at the greatest moments of the season, from dramatic rescues and to heart-warming adoptions, to heated encounters with parolees. Plus, a look behind the scenes and updates on the dogs featured this season.

16.title: Unleashed
16.plot: A recap of the highs and lows at Villalobos Rescue Center over the past season in New Orleans.

1.title: Out of the Dark
1.plot: Tia recruits the twins and newly hired work release prisoner to rescue a pit bull from the bottom of a 40-foot hole. Then, Mariah helps Tia with a heart-wrenching adopton to a young couple reeling from the tragic loss of their dog.

2.title: Shell Shocked
2.plot: Tania oversees the rescue of ten dogs left to die in deplorable conditions. Tia helps a family find the perfect companion for their special needs teenager. The adoption takes a turn for the bizarre when Tia learns about the family's large, exotic pet.

3.title: Pitch Black
3.plot: A midnight rescue finds Tia, Tania and new employee Perry scrambling after an injured dog. With the kennels pushed to the limit, a familiar face arrives returns to lend a helping hand. Then a chance at a forever home is threatened by an unexpected danger.

4.title: Puppy-Palooza
4.plot: A rescue mission brings Tia and daughter Mariah face to face with a protective mama dog and her litter of seven puppies. With Villalobos now overrun with puppies, it's up to new parolee William to step up and keep control of the rowdy pups.

5.title: Giving Back
5.plot: Two stray pit bulls hiding beneath a two-ton stack of lumber lure Tia into a dramatic and potentially deadly rescue. Then a colourful Bayou couple visit Villalobos in the hope of adopting a dog to fill the void left by their recently decesased pit bull.

6.title: Flood Watch
6.plot: Tia receives a call about a puppy stuck in a pipe at the edge of the river and enlists the help of the twins and the parolees to rescue the dog. Then, it's up to Tania and Perry to help build up a shy puppy's confidence when an adopter comes calling.

7.title: A New Future
7.plot: Tia brings in reinforcements to rescue a dog from a dangerous part of New Orleans. Tania is left stunned when she becomes the center of attention at her boyfriend's birthday party.

9.title: Rescuing the Holidays
9.plot: Join Tia, her kids, the parolees, old friends and beloved volunteers for a very special holiday gathering. Catch up with fan favorite pit bulls who have been adopted over the years. Re-live the most surprising rescues and the most poignant adoptions.

10.title: Can't Give Up
10.plot: When a dog finally gets a chance at being adopted, the Villalobos team has to drive all the way to Michigan for the home check. Their journey is disrupted when a plea for help sends Tia chashing after a dog that has been living on the streets for 2 years.

11.title: Collision Course
11.plot: A dangerous rescue mission is launched to secure two dogs spotted running wild on the train tracks next to the rescue center. And, a husband and wife come looking to adopt a dog to help them heal after a crippling accident.

12.title: Not Meant to Be
12.plot: An adopter from Texas fails to connect with the dog he drove hundreds of miles to adopt - but Tia might have the perfect match. Tania deals with a shocking drop-off. And a work-release inmate is in the hot seat when two prison guards visit Villalobos.

13.title: Battle Scars
13.plot: A frightening rescue sends the Villalobos team racing into the city in search of a dog reportedly hit by a car. And with kennels at peak capacity, hopes are pinned on adopting our a dog to a police officer and his sister.

14.title: Almost Perfect
14.plot: Tia and two parolees scramble to rescue a dog left for dead in a dangerous part of town. A college girl from South Carolina comes looking to adopt a special needs dog. And, the parolees scramble when a dog is dumped on the rescue center's doorstep.

15.title: Rescue Resurrection
15.plot: Tia gets a call about a dog loose at a construction site, and is shocked by what she discovers. A family with an unusual lifestyle comes looking to adopt a new puppy. And, when a favourite dog's cancer returns, Tia gets an emotional punch to the gut.

16.title: From the Shadows
16.plot: Tia and parolee William go the extra mile to ensure a shy, special needs dog is adopted by a couple from Florida. Then, Mariah enlists a parolee's help to rescue a dangerously skinny dog.

17.title: Unleashed
17.plot: A look back at the most memorable moments of season 5. Including never before seen moments, a look behind the scenes of Pit Bulls and Parolees, and a chance to catch up with past favorites.

1.title: Last Chance
1.plot: Tia takes in several dogs rescued from a dog-fighting ring. Cheech, who has been overlooked for years, finally gets a chance at a forever home. Finally, a parolee draws on his own experience as he tries to help troubled teens headed down the wrong path.

2.title: A Diamond in the Rough
2.plot: A dangerous midnight rescue ends with Tia chasing down a dog's mysterious origins. Then, a cat threatens to derail a Villalobos veteran's chance at a forever home. And a favorite parolee puts his neck on the line when he recommends a friend for a job.

3.title: Risky Business
3.plot: A former volunteer returns to adopt a dog she fell in love with, but her Boxer threatens to derail the adoption. And, only days after being released from prison, a parolee is on the wrong path - putting his freedom at risk.

4.title: Standing Strong
4.plot: A loose pit bull sends Tia and Louise on a frantic search through neighborhood surrounding Villalobos. New parolee Sui assists in his first adoption. Finally, Tania receives heartbreaking news about her beloved pit bull. Bluie.

5.title: Helter Shelter
5.plot: A friend in search of a fresh start arrives at Villalobos and finds himself in the middle of a contentious rescue involving a momma dog and her puppies. And, a former adopter wants to add another dog to their family, but a unique hurdle stands in the way.

6.title: Dumped
6.plot: When some puppies are dumped at VIllalobos, Mariah goes launches a mission to get more dogs spayed and neutered. Then, a dog running loose on freeway has Tia racing to save it. And, a heartbroken comes looking for a dog to help them heal.

7.title: Healing Hearts
7.plot: Tia races to save a dog left tied up in the sweltering summer heat. Matt returns home to rescue a pit bull on death row. And, Tania and Perry decide they are ready to open the hearts and home to a new dog.

8.title: Broken Home
8.plot: Tia and Matt find themselves in a heartbreaking situation when called upon to rescue some dogs from the home of their recently deceased owner. Then, a potential adopter comes looking for a dog that will thrive in an unusual living situation: a B&B.

9.title: Giving Thanks
9.plot: Tia rescues a handicapped puppy found in a sugar cane field. Earl is released from parole, leading to another major milestone in his life. And, a heart-breaking story leads to a heart-warming adoption.

10.title: Above and Beyond
10.plot: Tia scrambles after receiving a phone call about a severely emaciated pit bull, one of the worst cases she has ever seen. And, a campaign to build a shelter in a NY prison depends on Earl to convince authoties about the benefits of prison dog programs.

11.title: Good Gone Bad
11.plot: Tia sends Mariah to California to rescue a former member of the VRC family. A puppy's chance at a forever home is jeopardized by her behavior. And, Tia jumps into action after receiving an emergenct call about an abandoned pit bull.

12.title: A Clash of Wills
12.plot: A pit bull that's tied up and abandoned in a vacant lot prompts an urgent rescue attempt by Tia and Perry. Meanwhile, a returning adopter gets a big surprise; and a request from Earl's son turns into a lesson in hard work.

13.title: Saving Each Other
13.plot: A former volunteer returns to Villalobos looking for a new family member; a veteran hopes to be reunited with his dogs; another shelter needs help when it's overwhelmed by dogs rescued from deplorable conditions.

14.title: From Darkness to Dawn
14.plot: A veteran makes a heart-breaking plea for help being reunited with his dogs. A shelter overwhelmed by dogs rescued from shocking conditions seeks Tia's assistance. And a former volunteer returns to VRC in search of a new family member.

15.title: Taming the Beast
15.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

17.title: Blind Hope
17.plot: When a blind pit bull is attacked by other dogs, the Villalobos team steps-in and takes responsibility for his recovery. And, a couple from Pittsburgh mourning the loss of their pit bull, visits Villalobos and fall in love with one of Tia's favorite dogs.

18.title: Hero's Journey
18.plot: After her beloved dog passes away, an adopter comes to VRC hoping to fill the void in her heart. Louise and Matt rescue a dog that was hit by a car. And Tia's appearance on The Daily Show with John Stewart is threatened when her dog gets sick.

19.title: Long Road Home
19.plot: After spending over ten years in VRC's kennels, a Hurricane Katrina survivor has a shot at a forever home. And, Louise and Matt search for a loose pit bull on the streets and end up finding more than they bargained for.

20.title: Why We Go On
20.plot: After risking life and limb to rescue a scared pit bull, Tia finds herself battling with a local shelter over the dog's fate. And, after a long recovery, a dog that was rescued from the brink of death finally has a shot at a forever home in Boston.

21.title: Unleashed
21.plot: A look back at the most memorable moments of season 6. Including never before seen moments, a look behind the scenes of Pit Bulls and Parolees, and a chance to catch up with past favorites.

1.title: New Frontiers
1.plot: A new season brings new challenges as Villalobos Rescue Center expands beyond New Orleans and into the surrounding swamps, opening a satellite shelter in nearby Assumption Parish.

2.title: Jail Break
2.plot: A stray dog is stuck in a swamp; Tia accepts two sick puppies from an overwhelmed owner; a Villalobos favorite gets a shot at a forever home.

3.title: Jail Break
3.plot: A stray dog is stuck in a swamp; Tia accepts two sick puppies from an overwhelmed owner; a Villalobos favorite gets a shot at a forever home.

4.title: Scarred
4.plot: Ready to take on more responsibility, Sui leads her first rescue; adopter with many chickens looks for a suitable dog; Tia rescues a pit bull with scars revealing a painful past.

6.title: New Heights
6.plot: After their beloved dog passes, an adventurous Californian couple searches for a new best friend, Matt races against time to save puppies from under railroad ties, and Villalobos receives devastating news about one of their favorite dogs.

10.title: A New Best Friend
10.plot: Tia attempts to rescue a scared pit bull after he is abandoned by his owners in an empty house. A mother and daughter from Oklahoma arrive in New Orleans, seeking a new best friend. And Tia's personal dog, Jethro, falls dangerously ill.

11.title: Low Rider
11.plot: An dog's chance at a forever home is put at risk when a tumor is found. Tia faces a tough decision when an aggressive dog becomes a danger to her staff. VRC tries to reunite a stray dog with its owner.

12.title: The Gift
12.plot: With the holidays quickly approaching, Tia surprises her family, the parolees and every dog at the rescue with an extraordinary gift. But turning this giant gift into something Villalobos can actually use will require herculean effort.

15.title: Behind Bars
15.plot: Tia enlists Matt's help adopting a patrol dog out to his former home, Dixon prison. Then, Tia gets a call about two dogs left behind when their owners abandoned the property. And, Tania has trouble letting go when Brandi is up for adoption.

21.title: Tia vs. Nature
21.plot: Over 6 seasons, Villalobos has fought an epic battle against their arch enemy: Mother Nature.

22.title: Unforgettable
22.plot: A new season brings new challenges as Villalobos Rescue Center expands beyond New Orleans and into the surrounding swamps, opening a satellite shelter in nearby Assumption Parish.

23.title: Life Transformed
23.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Down, Not Out
1.plot: After Tia suffers a devestating injury, her kids have to step up to keep Villalobos running. Everyone's help is needed to catch an elusive dog in the middle of the night. And, a family of 8 needs a new companion to complete their active home.

2.title: Redeemed
2.plot: Earl returns from rehab, hoping to rebuild his life working with the dogs. A couple comes looking for a dog who can handle the crowded streets of NYC. And, Lizzy rescues a dog after a confrontation with the owner who abandoned it.

3.title: Kindness of Strangers
3.plot: After flooding devastates Louisiana, Tia and her team race to help the victims, including former adopters whose home has been destroyed, and a woman separated from her dogs when water overwhelmed her house.

4.title: Down Below
4.plot: A woman travels all the way from San Diego to give one of Villalobos' senior dogs a chance at a home. Lizzy and Marcel search for a mama dog's lost puppies out in the country. A new parolee makes a helpful discovery on his first day.

5.title: Rock City Rescue
5.plot: Tia heads to Detroit to help a rescue facility at risk of being shut down. Villalobos looks for a stray pit bull in a nearby neighborhood. A grieving adopter comes to VRC, hoping to find a dog to fill the void in her heart.

6.title: Our Gift
6.plot: When Tia receives an adoption email unlike any she's seen before, she makes a cross-country trip to find a dog a special home in time for Christmas. The kids' partners band together to give the family a present they'll never forget.

7.title: Pushing Forward
7.plot: Tia attempts to rescue a stray, but her leg injury hinders her. New parolee Mike struggles to balance working and being a parent. A family comes to Villalobos to adopt a dog for their daughter, but finding a good match proves a challenge.

8.title: Hounded
8.plot: When a dog that was adopted out mysteriously appears in a shelter in Mississippi, Tania and Earl head to the rescue. Parolee Joe is left shaken after separating two stray dogs fighting outside the shelter. And a hound dog adoption doesn't go as planned.

9.title: Going the Distance
9.plot: After his adopter passes away, Tania heads to California to pick up a former VRC dog. A couple from Arkansas struggle to make a decision about which dog to adopt. And, after being rescued, a badly injured puppy is discovered to be a missing pet.

10.title: Unleashed: Season 8
10.plot: A look back at the most memorable moments from the past season. Including never before seen moments and a chance to catch up with past favorites.

11.title: Longing for Home
11.plot: Newlyweds from New Jersey come looking for a new family member. Tia rescues an injured stray that the community has been trying to help. And, with his family back home in Virginia, longtime parolee Sui faces a tough decision.

13.title: Eye of the Storm
13.plot: When a tornado tears through New Orleans, Tania takes charge - but is furious when the parolees fail to show up to help. And a fellow pit bull trainer seeks Tia's help adopting a dog she can put to work.

15.title: A Street Dog Named Desire
15.plot: After a couple from New Jersey falls in love with a new best friend, the adoption is put on the line when Dr. Kristen discovers a heart murmur. Tia heads out to the swamps to rescue a dog in need of medical attention and is shocked by the diagnosis.

16.title: The Incomparable Dr. K
16.plot: An outbreak of disease in the swamps threatens the dogs. Tania goes out on her own to save a stray pit from the streets and is faced with a difficult rescue. And after years of waiting for a forever home, Jackson finally gets his shot.

17.title: New Day, New Blood
17.plot: Tia is short-staffed, but finding a parolee who is prepared for the demands of the job is proving difficult. Then, when Tia hears about a pack of pit bulls running in the street, the team races to the rescue and find an overwhelmed owner.

18.title: Second Savior
18.plot: A call in the middle of the night sends Tia racing to deal with a family emergency. A homeless man reaches out for assistance when his dog has trouble breathing. And, a healthy dog tied up outside VRC leads to a shocking story and a difficult decision.

19.title: Never Meant Harm
19.plot: After seeing their dog rescued on an episode of the series, a family contacts Tia in the hope of being reunited. Tia is forced to confront Earl about his sudden change in behavior. And, Matt makes a life-altering decision.

6.title: The Gift
6.plot: When Tia receives an adoption email unlike any she's seen before, she makes a cross-country trip to find a dog a special home in time for Christmas. And, the kid's significant others band together to give the family a present they'll never forget.

1.title: City of Second Chances
1.plot: A mother and son travel from Boston with hopes of adopting a dog, but Tia struggles to find a good fit for the family. Lizzy rescues a maggot-covered dog that was found lying on the road and races to the vet, hoping to save her.

2.title: Young Blood
2.plot: An inmate starts working at VRC, hoping to fill the big shoes left by Country Matt. Lizzy and Joe struggle to catch a stray and a family comes to Villalobos to adopt a dog, hoping to fill a void in their hearts.

3.title: A Girl Named Gun
3.plot: After a couple from New Jersey falls in love with a new best friend, the adoption is put on the line when Dr. Kristen discovers a heart murmur. Tia heads out to the swamps to rescue a dog in need of medical attention and is shocked by the diagnosis.

4.title: A Home At Last
4.plot: Villalobos' oldest resident, Summer, a pit with severe arthritis, has a chance at a forever home. Earl works to improve a dog's social skills, hoping to make him more adoptable. And Kanani's girlfriend, M2, takes on her first rescue.

5.title: Midnight Savior
5.plot: A call in the middle of the night sends Tia racing to deal with a family emergency. A homeless man reaches out for assistance when his dog has trouble breathing. And, a healthy dog tied up outside VRC leads to a shocking story and a difficult decision.

6.title: Tip of the iceberg
6.plot: After Tia and Sugar rescue a stray, they are shocked by what they find and race him to the vet. New worker Darius pursues his dream of working in the veterinary field. And an empty nest-er heads to Villalobos looking for a new companion.

7.title: A Different Mission
7.plot: Earl takes the lead in restoring an abandoned Rottweiler to health. A service dog organization from North Carolina reaches out to Villalobos searching for a new dog for their program. M2 goes on her second rescue, taking in an owner surrender.

8.title: Rising Tide
8.plot: Concerned about flooding in Assumption Parish, Tia seeks a solution for how she and the dogs would be able to evacuate quickly. After he rescues an injured dog off the streets, Joe feels a special bond and takes him under his wing.

9.title: Our Growing Pack
9.plot: A California man hopes to find a new dog to stay by his side as be battles cancer. After Lizzy rescues a sick dog, she rushes to the vet, hoping it's not too late. Tania and Perry prepare to embark on a new chapter in life - parenthood.

10.title: Hounded
10.plot: With Villalobos' country location overrun with hounds, Tia turns to a trusted parolee and his new wife to help get one of the lovable but troublesome dogs a new home.

imdb.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees

other companies.name: American Roadshow Motion Picture And Television Catering

plot: The Villalobos Rescue Center is the largest pit bull rescue in the USA, now located in New Orleans, LA. This show shows the interaction of the dog and man; About pets and people that no one wants.::Anonymous
